Optical Character Recognition¶

scinoephile.ocr.OCRBase Base for OCR classes
scinoephile.ocr.OCRDataset A collection of character images
scinoephile.ocr.LabeledOCRDataset A collection of labeled character images
scinoephile.ocr.TrainOCRDataset A collection of labeled character images for training
scinoephile.ocr.TestOCRDataset A collection of labeled character images for testing
scinoephile.ocr.ImageSubtitleDataset A collection of image-based subtitles
scinoephile.ocr.ImageSubtitleSeries A series of image-based subtitles
scinoephile.ocr.ImageSubtitleEvent An individual image-based subtitle
scinoephile.ocr.Model Machine learning model
scinoephile.ocr.AutoTrainer Automated machine learning model trainer

save(path, format_=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Saves subtitles to an output file, warning that data will be lost if not saved to hdf5

pysubs2.SSAFile.save expects an open text file, so we open the hdf5 file here for consistency.

classmethod load(path, encoding='utf-8', imgmode=None, verbosity=1, **kwargs)[source]¶

SSAFile.from_file expects an open text file, so we open hdf5 here

Centers image data

Parameters:
  • data (numpy.ndarray) – Character image data
  • x_offset (int) – Offset to apply along x axis
  • y_offset (int) – Offset to apply along y axis
Returns:

Centered character image
Return type:

numpy.ndarray
scinoephile.ocr.generate_char_data(char, font='/System/Library/Fonts/STHeiti Light.ttc', fig=None, size=60, width=5, x_offset=0, y_offset=0, mode='1 bit')[source]¶

Generates an image of a character

Parameters:
  • char (str) – character of which to draw an image of
  • font (str) – font with which to draw character
  • fig (matplotlib.figure.Figure, optional) – figure on which to draw character
  • size (int, optional) – font size with which to draw character
  • (int, optional (y_offset) – border width with which to draw character
  • x_offset (int, optional) – x offset to apply to character
  • (int, optional – y offset to apply to character
Returns:

Character image data
Return type:

numpy.ndarray
